analysisInformation.analyzingCode:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading indicating that code analysis is in progress.
**UI Location**: Iteration analysis information section, when analysis is pending.
**When Users See This**: While the system is analyzing the user's code after an iteration is submitted.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "We're analysing your code for suggestions"
analysisInformation.analysisTime:
**Functional Purpose**: Message informing the user about the expected duration of the code analysis.
**UI Location**: Iteration analysis information section, below the analysis in-progress heading.
**When Users See This**: While the system is analyzing the user's code.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "This usually takes 10-30 seconds."
analysisInformation.noAutoSuggestions:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading suggesting human mentoring when no automated feedback is available.
**UI Location**: Iteration analysis information section, when automated feedback is absent.
**When Users See This**: When an iteration has not been tested or has no automated feedback.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "No auto suggestions? Try human mentoring."
analysisInformation.getHumanMentoring:
**Functional Purpose**: Paragraph encouraging users to get human mentoring for a specific exercise and track.
**UI Location**: Iteration analysis information section, below the 'no auto suggestions' heading.
**When Users See This**: When an iteration has no automated feedback.
**Technical Context**: Variables `%{exerciseTitle}` and `%{trackTitle}` must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "Get real 1-to-1 human mentoring on the {exercise.title} exercise and start writing better {track.title}."
analysisInformation.getMentoring:
**Functional Purpose**: Call-to-action button for accessing human mentoring.
**UI Location**: Iteration analysis information section, below the mentoring description.
**When Users See This**: When an iteration has no automated feedback.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Get mentoring"
analysisInformation.testFailed:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading indicating that tests failed and analysis could not proceed.
**UI Location**: Iteration analysis information section, when tests have failed.
**When Users See This**: When an iteration's tests have failed.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Beep boop bob a hop, could not computeâ€¦"
analysisInformation.passingTestsNeeded:
**Functional Purpose**: Message explaining why code analysis is not possible when tests fail.
**UI Location**: Iteration analysis information section, below the 'tests failed' heading.
**When Users See This**: When an iteration's tests have failed.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "In order for our systems to analyze your code, the tests must be passing."
